titleInfo.title: Mrs. Audigier with an Obelisk Top

mods.abstract: Mrs. Audigier standing to the right of an obelisk; the obelisk top depicts the form of Ramses II (foreground); obelisk located outside of Egyptian Museum in Cairo (left middle ground); description of scene in Mr. Audigier's handwriting in black ink, back of photo; "Au 735", "927.1/A1" and "Silverprint" written in pencil on back of photo; untitled print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

mods.note: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Louis Bailey Audigier, McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture, The University of Tennessee
